mdRecord.dcterms:title: Calling on Lou by Larry Richman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Clippings of newspaper articles and a poster on Calling on Lou: the Stories and Poems of Lou Crabtree. Adapted for stage by Larry Richman, Directed by William Van Keyser, Costumes by Karen Brewster, Lighting by Al Oster. Newspapers: Washington County News: Aug 1, Sep 5, 1984, Bristol Herald Courier: Sep 23, 1984.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
